author: The Vegetarian Society
method: Soak the raisins in the apple juice for 1 hour. Add the ginger beer and root ginger juice. Serve at once.
ingredients: 1oz/25g raisins,  3½pts/2L apple juice,  3½pts/2L ginger beer,  1in/2cm piece root ginger (grated with skin on and squeezed for the juice - should yield about 1 tbsp/15ml)
